author: janwar soeheri
text: Gym is well equipped for your workout. They have a few machines which are not available in other AF I visited. Like the open space and pool to relax after workout. Will visit more often if around the area.

author: david churchill
text:
The cardio room is quite dark and there is no ez bar at the gym.
Most gym equipment is nice.

author: Priya Sathiyan
text: Well maintained and a wide variety of equipment, friendly staff and easy access to Stevens MRT and Cold Storage next door! Been coming since last November and enjoy the music choices and lighting :)

author: Huimin
text:
I joined Anytime Fitness Stevens in Oct 2024 towards the end of a personal training program elsewhere, and looking for another gym to sustain my fitness journey on my own.  Been with AF Stevens for about 5 months. I chose this as my home gym as it is very near MRT like maybe a few mins walk away and is on my route to office. AF Stevens is pretty well equipped, usually well maintained with 4 squat racks, hack squat machine, hip thrust machine, smith machine, back extension, pec fly machine, leg extension, hip abductor machine, T-bar, seated rows, lat pull down, at least 4 benches and many more, and also a separate room beside for cardio machines like treadmills. The gym is well spaced and not so crowded at least during the time I usually go. What I like most is the gym provides lockers (u use your own padlock but that is good enough) and has shower facilities which some other AF gyms don‚Äôt have which is important to me as I don‚Äôt live exactly near the gym.

They also provide sanitizer sprays and towels for us to wipe the machines which some other AF gyms don‚Äôt have.  It is well ventilated air conditioned with fans rotating and blowing.

I am shifting house in a few months time and the AF gym which is in my new neighbourhood does not have locker and shower facilities‚Ä¶

I think I will miss AF Stevens already‚Ä¶
Keep it up AF Stevens team!

Thanks.

author: szehow ng
text:
I‚Äôve been frequenting AF Stevens branch for over 3 years now. Throughout my time here, I can say that this is a good gym with nice equipment and a great owner.

Unfortunately, a highly unpleasant experience with one of their staff (I suspect I know which one) has led me to the decision to stop frequenting this branch.

The incident involved a fine (of which I received no warning of). When discussing the matter, the staff member, among other things, threatened to block access to my FOB and refused to allow me to talk directly to the boss. The issue does not lie with the fine itself - I am open to paying it. The issue lies in the manner and unprofessionalism in which this particular staff member dealt with the issue. It is poor business sense and no way to treat a loyal customer of 3+ years. My requests of speaking directly with the boss were reasonable and appropriate.

As a result of all this, I‚Äôll be looking to change my membership to a more convenient location near my workplace at the earliest opportunity.

It‚Äôs unfortunate that this singular experience with this particular staff member has ruined an otherwise pleasant 3+ years at AF Stevens. I‚Äôd recommend the owner to take corrective action against the staff in question, so as to avoid similar incidents happening to other members in the future. It‚Äôs particularly disappointing and unfortunate, as I have actually talked to the owner on multiple occasions, and he is a very nice uncle.

author: Chris Koh
text:
New equipment and clean.
Awesome place.

1hr free parking at the apartment carpark is a bit short though. Would rather a 1.5hr or a 2hr free parking for gym goers.

author: Khim Siang Kua
text: Nice and clean gym with all the necessary equipments! Very friendly and helpful staff and gym members! The selection of music is power too! ü§òüèº Overall a gym with very positive vibes! üí™üèº Oh! And they sell really delicious and wallet friendly protein powders! Go check it out! üòâ ‚Ä¶

author: Dan O
text: Definitely one of the best gyms I‚Äôve been too! Not only are the staff super nice & friendly, but the committee of gym goers are too. In terms of equipments and space, it is more than enough for an average guy/girl looking to get a workout in

author: Rishi Anand
text:
I‚Äôve been a member for more than 3 years and really enjoy my workouts here. The gym now has a separate cardio section leaving enough space even when it gets busy.
Ian is a fantastic trainer and after trying a few other types of workouts I can vouch for the results one can get training here.
Highly recommend the place to anyone in the area. The proximity to Steven‚Äôs mrt is another added advantage.

author: Chili Red Arowana
text: Small outlet, the cardio room is diff from the weight lifting room‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs quite dark not enough lighting in the cardio room‚Ä¶ hence 3 star, but overall feels ok.

author: Marcus Lim
text:
This is a friendly neighborhood gym.
The staff here are close friends with many of the members.
Take Mr Venturi Wong as an example. He is friendly to all gym members and constantly chit chats with all. I have encountered rude and unreasonable staff from other anytime fitness gyms, and I will never go back there.
If you want a friendly gym with a relatively wide range of equipment. This is the place to go to.

author: Kelvin Tan
text: This is a great af. Super clean and well maintained equipment. From the outside it may look small but it's surprisingly roomy on the inside. I liked the selection of machines as I saw they had a hack squat and incline chest support row machine as well which aren't so common in the other AFs I've been to.

author: nusha dakshyni
text: equipment is quite new, facilities are clean & spacious. treadmill & functional area are in a separate room. staff is friendly. it's like 100m from stevens MRT, really nice space!

author: Danial Oliver
text: Smaller than most gyms, but that's gives it a home-y feel. Also they give out towels for workouts/showers, while many other gyms just ask you to buy their branded one when you forgot yours. Also the staff are really really friendly üòä ‚Ä¶

author: brendan kwan
text: Excellent customer service, Staff members are extremely accommodative when customers respond in a polite manner. Clean and well maintained

author: Marc Nerva (Cramolio)
text: Excellent gym, great equipment, nice owner and an awesome in-house trainer! This team has definitely changed my life. I'd be fatter and my blood pressure would be worse without them.

author: Jeremy Lim
text: Excellent facilities with multiple squat racks.

author: Adam Y
text:
The Anytime Fitness Steven's franchisee isn't a very honest business owner. I was informed that I would be precharged for membership during P2HA which gym use was prohibited. Then after their attempt to say it's a misunderstanding, I proceeded to inform them that I'd be terminating my membership.

I have been trying to get a confirmation on the cancellation after multiple attempts and my membership is still active.

Poor communication, poor business ethics and bad service.

author: Roy Chandran
text:
Awesome staff venturi is always chill and friendly
Still come to steven even though there are other closer gym . The ppl there are also friendly.

author: Anjali Saroea
text: I've been going to AF Stevens for a couple of years now and it's a great gym... clean, new equipment and good management.

author: Keira Ducusin ang
text: No doubt the staff and PT are very helpful and friendly. The equipments are well maintained and it‚Äôs very convenient with MRT nearby and things to eat just beside the gym!üëçüèº ‚Ä¶

author: Sky Lam
text: Clean gym, friendly and helpful staff!! New machines and conducive environment to train in as well!

author: Ian Tan
text: I love Vergil and Venturi

author: Jeremiah Sullivan
text: I love this gym so much. Should add more machines and take over that glasses shop on the side!

author: KO
text: Its cheap and walking distance but its small messy crowded and sometimes not very clean

author: David Tan
text: Ven is a 10/10 staff. Would highly recommend dropping by. Amazing atmosphere.

author: Suhail Ahmed
text: One of the finest anytime fitness center in SG, best machinery and great vibes

author: Anan
text: Great gym for a quickie. If u coming with groups, this place might not be a suitable gym to go

author: ganengseng official
text: best anytime fitness in singapore by far with a homely vibe

author: Harsh Saxena
text: Great place and nice owners - gym is brand new

author: Saurav Das
text: It has all the important equipment.

author: Chris Ng
text: Cozy yet well-equipped. A place where the manager actually remembers faces.

author: Edica Razak
text: Small but clean & great environment to work out.

author: Miguel Francisco Niziolek
text: Friendly staff and great place to work out!

author: Andrew Ng
text: There is no toilet for relieving myself :(

author: Padarn Wilson
text: Clean, well equiped. What else?

author: phong nguy·ªÖn
text: Ok

author: Chaik Ming Tham
text: Good

author: Selah V
text: Better than Bukit Timah central imo
